import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { HttpClient} from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-user', templateUrl: './list-user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-user.component.css'] }) export class ListUserComponent { userInfo:any = [] allUserInfo :any= []; isFetch : boolean = true; baseUrl:any = '' constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private http: HttpClient ){ } ngOnInit(){ if(this.isFetch){ this.userInfo = this.route.snapshot.data; this.allUserInfo = this.userInfo.listUser.data; } else{ console.log("Nothing"); } } onSearch(){ this.isFetch = false; return this.http.get(`${this.baseUrl}/api/63b6bacabf38bc2eb8d72307/search`}); } }
